nodes.text: A droid truck was a type of truck presumably operated by a droid or droids. When training a group of struggling new Imperial cadets at the Galactic Empire's Academy for Young Imperials on Lothal, Lieutenant Currahee shouted at them to test their resolve, telling them that one of these trucks was waiting for them if they wanted to quit. Once, while traveling on her jumpspeeder to the Transportation Ministry on Lothal, Merei Spanjaf passed a slow-moving droid truck.
